prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (stoic lethal alien assassin:1.2), (deep purple-tinted biological skin:1.2), sharp angular facial features, cold focused gaze, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (subtle skin imperfections and veins:1.1), source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching weathered leather trench coat texture:1.3), sharp focus on face, cinematic low-key lighting, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, human skin tone, bright neon purple, airbrushed, smooth skin, low quality, friendly face
